org.sloth.web
Class FrontPageController

java.lang.Object
  org.sloth.web.FrontPageController

@Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/")
@SessionAttributes(value={"observations","observation","categories"})
public class FrontPageController
extends Object

Controller to handle the front page. It cares for filling the map, search the database and creating new Observations.

Author:
Christian Autermann, Stefan Arndt, Dustin Demuth, Christoph Fendrich, Simon Ottenhues, Christian Paluschek

fillMap

@RequestMapping(method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView fillMap(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                           @RequestParam(value="q",required=false)
                                                                           String string)
Handles the GET request. It creates the model to fill the Map with Observations. An optional query parameter is also processed.

public String saveObservation(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse request,
                                             @ModelAttribute(value="observation")
                                             Observation observation,
                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
